description:
Hazel Mirai was a friend of http://anidb.net/ch147093 [Minegenius] and http://anidb.net/ch143760 [Northern Harris] during their education at the Rettoran Magic Academy.
It is revealed in episode 12 that she is the younger version of http://anidb.net/ch143793 [Kurumi`s grandmother].
name: Hazel Mirai
